title: Moonlight Whispers
description: Hunter or hunted? These wolves are both.I’ve never been so scared for the lives of my pack. At the same time, we’ve never been so close to solving this mystery. We have to push on, danger or not, and we have to succeed to save them. This time, though, we’ve tempted fate once too often. We face sharp ice and a black Moon, as they say, and the blood on my hands isn’t from our enemies. Moon save us.
author: K.R. Alexander
